title: Adjustments of Certain Rates of Pay
summary: Executive Order 14368, issued on December 18, 2025, adjusts various federal pay rates effective January 1, 2026. It details adjustments for statutory pay systems including the General Schedule, Foreign Service Schedule, and Veterans Health Administration schedules. The order also sets rates for the Senior Executive Service, Executive Schedule, Vice President, Congress, and judicial salaries. Additionally, it outlines pay adjustments for uniformed services and includes provisions for locality-based comparability payments, with specific rates provided for different geographical areas. The order supersedes Executive Order 14132 of December 23, 2024.
